query.value:
select 
  t.TABLE_CAT
, t.TABLE_SCHEM
, s.SCHEMA_TEXT
, t.TABLE_NAME
, t.TABLE_TYPE
, t.REMARKS
, t.TYPE_CAT
, t.TYPE_SCHEM
, t.TYPE_NAME as table_type_name
, t.SELF_REFERENCING_COL_NAME
, t.REF_GENERATION
, t.DBNAME
, t.TABLE_TEXT
, c.COLUMN_NAME
, c.DATA_TYPE
, c.TYPE_NAME as column_type_name
, c.COLUMN_SIZE
, c.BUFFER_LENGTH
, c.DECIMAL_DIGITS
, c.NUM_PREC_RADIX
, c.NULLABLE
, c.REMARKS as column_remarks
, c.COLUMN_DEF
, c.SQL_DATA_TYPE
, c.SQL_DATETIME_SUB
, c.CHAR_OCTET_LENGTH
, c.ORDINAL_POSITION
, c.IS_NULLABLE
, c.JDBC_DATA_TYPE
, c.SCOPE_CATALOG
, c.SCOPE_SCHEMA
, c.SCOPE_TABLE
, c.SOURCE_DATA_TYPE
, c.PSEUDO_COLUMN
, c.COLUMN_TEXT
, c.SYSTEM_COLUMN_NAME
, c.I_DATA_TYPE
, c.HIDDEN
, c.HAS_DEFAULT
, c.SOURCE_TYPE_NAME
, c.SOURCE_SQL_DATA_TYPE
, c.SOURCE_JDBC_DATA_TYPE
, '@{utcNow()}' as measure_time
FROM sysibm.SQLTABLES t
join sysibm.SQLSCHEMAS s on s.TABLE_CAT = t.TABLE_CAT and s.TABLE_SCHEM = t.TABLE_SCHEM
join sysibm.SQLcolumns c on c.TABLE_CAT = t.TABLE_CAT and c.TABLE_SCHEM = t.TABLE_SCHEM and c.TABLE_NAME = t.TABLE_NAME
where (t.table_name in ('POMHDR' ,
'POMCAN',
'POMHST',
'POSTAT',
'POMDTL',
'POMDSQ',
'POMXTK',
'EDAASNI')
or t.table_name like 'INV%' and t.table_name not like '%DUPE%')
and s.TABLE_SCHEM IN ('MM760LIB', 'MMLIBARCH', 'QGPL', 'STKUPD')

/* 
-- Collect these:
+ MM760LIB	MMS 7.6.0 Database Library
+ MMLIBARCH	MM760LIB Archive Library
+ QGPL	    General Purpose Library
+ STKUPD	  Library for Stock Ledger Level Clearing

-- Ignore these:
- POMRST910	null
- MM760DVL	MMS 7.6.0 Development Database Files
- MM760QAL	MMS 7.6.0 QA Database Files
 */
select '@{item().table_schem}' table_schema, '@{item().table_name}' table_name, count(*) num_rows, '@{utcNow()}' measure_time from @{item().table_schem}.@{item().table_name}

select 'S10F8F6P' AS TABLE_CAT, 'AHLIB' AS TABLE_SCHEM, 'POMHDR' AS TABLE_NAME, 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE' AS TABLE_TEXT, 'POEDAT' AS COLUMN_NAME, 'Entry Date' AS COLUMN_TEXT
, MIN(POEDAT) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POEDAT) AS MAX_DATE, '@{utcNow()}' AS MEASURE_TIME
from AHLIB.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'AHLIB', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE',     'POLCHG', 'Last Change Date'
, MIN(POLCHG) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POLCHG), '@{utcNow()}'
from AHLIB.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MM760DVL', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE',  'POEDAT', 'Entry Date' 
, MIN(POEDAT) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POEDAT), '@{utcNow()}'
from MM760DVL.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MM760DVL', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE',  'POLCHG', 'Last Change Date'
, MIN(POLCHG) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POLCHG), '@{utcNow()}'
from MM760DVL.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MM760LIB', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE',  'POEDAT', 'Entry Date' 
, MIN(POEDAT) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POEDAT), '@{utcNow()}'
from MM760LIB.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MM760LIB', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE',  'POLCHG', 'Last Change Date'
, MIN(POLCHG) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POLCHG), '@{utcNow()}'
from MM760LIB.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MM760QAL', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE',  'POEDAT', 'Entry Date' 
, MIN(POEDAT) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POEDAT), '@{utcNow()}'
from MM760QAL.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MM760QAL', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE',  'POLCHG', 'Last Change Date'
, MIN(POLCHG) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POLCHG), '@{utcNow()}'
from MM760QAL.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MMLIBARCH', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE', 'POEDAT', 'Entry Date' 
, MIN(POEDAT) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POEDAT), '@{utcNow()}'
from MMLIBARCH.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MMLIBARCH', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE', 'POLCHG', 'Last Change Date'
, MIN(POLCHG) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POLCHG), '@{utcNow()}'
from MMLIBARCH.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'POMRST910', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE', 'POEDAT', 'Entry Date' 
, MIN(POEDAT) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POEDAT), '@{utcNow()}'
from POMRST910.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'POMRST910', 'POMHDR', 'PURCHASE ORDER HEADER FILE', 'POLCHG', 'Last Change Date'
, MIN(POLCHG) as MIN_DATE, MAX(POLCHG), '@{utcNow()}'
from POMRST910.POMHDR 
union select 'S10F8F6P', 'MM760LIB', 'POMXTK', 'PO Reason Code trackingfile', 'TKDATE', 'Tracking Date' 
, MIN(TKDATE) as MIN_DATE, MAX(TKDATE), '@{utcNow()}'
from MM760LIB.POMXTK
